item.title: A nice way to setup tonic repo
item.description: A nice way to setup tonic repo Using gRPC usually requires both client & server to have same protobuf definition. Client and server usually are not defined in the same repository. We can use a separate git repository to store the protobuf definition, and using the git submodule to include the protobuf definition in the corresponding client and server. Check sample repo to see how to setup
